label: 藤原実光
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1069-1147). Erudite" of literature. Tutor to Emperors Toba and Sutoku. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩 (6), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (3), and Wakan kensakushū (1). Waka in Kin'yōshū (2) and Wakan kensakushū (1). [鳥羽、崇徳、漢詩、和漢兼作集、和歌、金葉集] "
